InfluenceRule.name: More likely if R has recently been taboo and I hasn't
More likely if R has recently been rude
More likely if R has recently been gross and I hasn't
More likely if r is uncool
Less likely if r is cool
Less likely if r is popular
More likely if emotional and feeling bad about r
More likely if R likes lame things and I doesn't
More likely if doesn't like them anyway
More likely if dislikes them anyway
Less likely if competitive and I has other friends
More likely if vengeful and I has been a douche
Less likely to be domineered if domineering
Popular kids don't like to be accused of being annoying
Less likely if thinks is cool
More likely if I has been rude recently

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% tried to break off %pron(i,his/her)% friendship with %r% but %prons(r,he/she)% didn't believe %pron(i,him/her)%
%i% got pissed about that thing %r% did
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% really into %i% as a friend. I mean like really into
%r% vowed to be more supportive of %i%
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% sending %i% way too many texts and %is% told %pron(r,him/her)% to lay off
%r% didn't realize that %is% %pron(i,was/were)% trying to get out of being friends with %pron(r,him/her)%
%r% reminded %i% of the good times %list(i,r,we/they)% used to have back when %is% %pron(i,was/were)% still into %CKB_((i,dislikes),(r,likes),())%s
%i% couldn't handle being both friends with and dating %r%
%i% cut off %pron(i,his/her)% friendship with %r% because %rs% stole %ip% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend
%i% broke off %pron(i,his/her)% lingering friendship with %pron(i,his/her)% ex-%gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)%, %r%
%i% couldn't end the lingering friendship with %pron(r,his/her)% ex, %r%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, %i% What's up? How's my %buddy%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh yeah... about that. Hey, I was thinking we should hang out less.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, uh, you're actually kind of annoying sometimes. Actually a lot of the time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So... what you're saying is...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah. Leave me alone.
Uh, hi, %r%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nothing much, %buddy%, just chillin.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, I was thinking... we should probably hang out less.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Heheh, whatever.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No, seriously, dude. Leave me alone.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(You're such a kidder,I'll leave your mom alone if you know what I mean,Yeah right. You bother me at least twice as much as I bother you. You goon)%. Heheheh.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %r%. It's you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %buddy%, what's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... you know how %toc1%? That was really uncool. I don't think we should be friends any more.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wait, what? Over a little thing like that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's been a bunch of things. I just wish you'd leave me alone, okay?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, if that's how you feel...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... look. I hate to say this, but you're really kind of dragging me down lately.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's just you've become, like, very uncool. You're laming my vibe.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So... what you're saying is...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Basically, uh... leave me alone.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OK. I get it.

Instantiation.name: LeaveMeAlone! - Not Cool Like Dislike Accept

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %i%! I was looking for you earlier. I wanted to tell you all about this %positiveadj% new %toc1% blog I found. It's got this amazing photo gallery that...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, look, %r%, about that. I'm getting really freaking sick of hearing about %toc1%s all the time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh! Well, I can talk about it less, you know. Maybe cut down on the number of links I text you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't think that's going to cut it. Look, just leave me alone. We're not friends any more, okay?
Hi, %r%. Look, I've been meaning to tell you... I don't think this friendship is working out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? What are you talking about? We have so much in common! We are totally perfect for each other! Uh, I mean, as friends!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: See, this is what I mean. I don't think that...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ....that we should spend as much time together, I know! See how close we are? It's like I can complete your thoughts! We're practically soulmates.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh.... well... maybe we'll talk about this later.
Uh, hi, %r%. Listen, I've been thinking...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah? Hey, %buddy%, you know you can tell me anything, and I'll be there for you. What's on your mind?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... uh... look, about our friendship...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I know what you're going to say. I haven't been as supportive as I should be. I'll try harder. You know this friendship is so important to me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhhh.... yeah, me too, %buddy%. Me too.
Ugh, %r%... Not you again.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%! I just sent you a text, didn't you get it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes.. I got it.. All 20 of them.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well.. Why didn't you respond!? I'm just trying to be a good friend!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So I've noticed. Listen %r%... You've just been kind of a bother lately...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wha... I don't understand.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's okay. Just leave me alone for a bit, okay?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...If you say so. But you'll come back for me - they always come back.
Oh! %i%! I was just about to text you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...Not again. What about this time?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: About what we're doing after school today! It's going to be a totally %positiveadj% time!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: About that... I've been kinda busy lately. I wish you'd just leave me alone.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But! Come on pal.. You don't mean that do you!? We're best buds!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh god... It's like killing a puppy...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: There there, it's all right. You've been under a lot of stress what with Prom coming up and all. Don't worry, we'll get through it together!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What!? That's not what I meant.. Ugh...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%! %greeting%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh.. Hey %r%..

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Remember how you love %toc1%s so much? Well I found this super awes-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Err... Save it %r%. I really can't stand that stuff any more.
I think it's about time you just leave me alone all together.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What!? But remember all the times we used to stay up late talking about %toc1%s!?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Those were good times.
Forget about it, %r%. I've just had a lot of things on my mind lately.
Okay.. %r%.. This is gonna seem really weird...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it %sweetie%? You know you can tell me anything!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know we've been thinking of ourselves as dating *and* friends... but I can't really seperate a friendship from a relationship.
I just think we should try being just %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend and %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... sure. Sure, let's try it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You've got a lot of nerve, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why, %buddy%! Whatever do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't play dumb with me! You thought I wouldn't notice that you stole my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend out from behind my back?
You're no friend of mine. Consider this friendship over. Leave me alone.
Ugh, look. We're over. Why are we still friends?
Leave me alone, okay? We broke up for a *reason*.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Fine! I don't know why I wanted to be friends with you anyways!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why are we still friends? Didn't we break up?
All this texting and 'friendship', we need space.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No we don't. We need each other, even though we're taking time off like this.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No really. I need you to leave me alone.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, no one knows me like you do, and I know you best too!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ugh... Fine. Just back up a bit, alright?
